title: Bird Goes Home
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 46 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR70L
description: The little bird has a long way to go to get back to her nest. She has to cross a city, a farm, mountains, and other obstacles. Touching illustrations accompany a text with repeated sentence patterns to make decoding easier.
meta: bird, city, farm, mountains, streets, tables
Syllable Awareness : Identify syllables in words
Consonants : Associate the letter Bb with the sound /b/
Capitalization and Punctuation : Recognize capital letters and periods in print
Position Words : Understand words associated with position
